Kevin Johnson talks about how traffic is increasing at a faster rate than the number of users and how the model will not scale. He notes the need for new business models and an increase in innovation. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. As Google Inc. has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog. ''And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured.''
